question: 殴り合い
sourceMnemonic: Remember <ja>殴る</ja>, which means "to punch"? Well, add on <ja>合う</ja> and you've got <vocabulary>punches</vocabulary> that have <vocabulary>come together</vocabulary> with other punches. By "come together" I mean your fist is coming in contact with someone's face, and their fist is coming in contact with your kidneys. In other words, this is a <vocabulary>fistfight</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings come from <ja>殴る</ja> and <ja>合う</ja>, punched together.
